en.intro-aboutme: Hi! My name is Julieta Barraza, I'm a student of the University Technical Degree in Programming at Universidad Tecnologica Nacional (FRGP).
en.country-aboutme: I am from Argentina, I have a B2 level in English and I'm currently searching for a job.
en.skills-aboutme: Thanks to my work experience and my studies, I have acquired fundamental knowledge of Programming (C++ / C#), Manual Testing (frontend and backend), Integrations through API REST, Databases, Support and Application Development.
en.experience-aboutme: I have practical experience as a Tester and with Application Support. I am a responsible person, with great problem solving skills and eager to keep learning.
en.utn-tup: University Technical Degree in Programming - Universidad Tecnologica Nacional (FRGP)
en.ios-course: iOS & Swift: The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp - Udemy
en.webdev-course: Introduction to Web Development: HTML y CSS - Google Digital Academy (Skillshop)
en.qa-course: QA for day-to-day use: from novice to expert - Udemy
en.subtitle-skills: These are some of the technologies I have expertise in
en.subtitle-projects: Here you can find some of my development projects
en.text-project-1: This project was developed for windows console as a final group project for the subject Laboratory 2 at UTN. Personal improvements were made in the use and functionality of all menus. It was developed under the Object-oriented Programming paradigm, using binary data files.
en.text-project-2: Mobile application development made for the course iOS & Swift: The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp. Allows to throw randomly 2 dice numbered from 1 to 6.
en.text-project-3: Desktop application for Product management. Team project for the subject Programming 3 of the University Technician in Programming at the UTN. Developed with WinForm (.NET Framework) and Microsoft SQL Server database.
en.tech-project-3: Developed with C#, .NET Framework and T-SQL
